definitions: the state of not being in accordance with accepted standards or rules; lack of authorization by the law

examples.text: she talks with anger about the illegitimacy of the election

shortDefinitions: state of not being in accordance with accepted standards or rules

definitions: the state of being born to parents not lawfully married to each other

examples.text: the citizens refuse to believe Buckingham's stories about the princes' illegitimacy

shortDefinitions: state of being born to parents not lawfully married to each other
